summary: A kickboxing champion is jailed for a accidental murder with the help of testimony from his enemy - but upon his release, he takes on his nemesis in a winner-take-all fight.
cast: John Barrett|Keith Vitali|Terry Norton|Brad Morris|Ted Le Plat|Mike Huff|Len Sparrowhawk|Roger Yuan|Evan J. Klisser|Gavin Hood|Patrick Lyster|Larry Martin|Gary Chalmers|Frank Notaro|Tootsie Lombard|Jeff Fannell|Alex von Reumont|Michael Megrian|Alex Mathieson|Peter Ucko|Tom Agnew|Judd Lasarow|Zia Garfield|Graham Clarke|Deon Stewardson|Caroline Smart|Mike Larengera|Isaac Mavimbela|Charles Stodel|Carlos Silva Da Silva|Lazlo Fagyas|Roberto Cortese|Jack Stodel|Ralph Milne|Andrew Whyte|Dudley Du Plessis|Raymond Samuel|Kiki Architto|David Sherwood|Barbara Mathieson|Mark Mulder|Thorsten Wedekind|Terence Shank|Sharon Malujlo
title: American Kickboxer
